Hammond.Stallbohm Barn-Kaske House: Stallbohm Barn-Kaske House, also known as Bieker Woods and Heritage Park, is a historic home and English barn located at Munster, Lake County, Indiana. The house was built in 1909, and is a two-story, American Foursquare frame dwelling. It has a jerkinhead roof and is sheathed in clapboard siding.
